Compile time API

Imports

db

Types

Callback = proc (v: Values) {.nimcall.}
Command = object
  name*: string
  case commandType: CommandType
  of typeCommandLine, typeSubCommandLine:
      commandName: string
      callbackName*: string
      callback: Callback
      description: string
      args: OrderedTable[string, Parameter]
      index: seq[ParamTuple]

  else:
    nil
  
CommandType = enum
  typeCommandLine, typeCommentLine, typeSubCommandLine
Kapsis = ref object
  indent*: int8
  app_name*: string          ## The application name
  commands*: OrderedTableRef[string, Command] ## Holds a parsable table with `Command` instances
  description*: string
  version*: string
  invalidArg*: string
  error*: string
  mainCommand*: string       ## used to set a main command that can be called
                             ## without specifying the command id..
  extras*: string

KapsisDefect = object of CatchableError
KapsisErrors = enum
  MaximumDepthSubCommand = "Maximum subcommand depth reached (3 levels)",
  ParentCommandNotFound = "Could not find a command id \"$1\"",
  ConflictCommandName = "Command name \"$1\" already exists"
Parameter = ref object
  case ptype*: ParameterType
  of Key:
      key: string
      vStr*: string

  of Variant:
      variant: seq[string]
      vTuple*: string

  of LongFlag:
      flag: string
      vLong*: bool

  of ShortFlag:
      sflag: string
      vShort*: bool

  help*: string

ParameterType = enum
  Key, Variant, LongFlag, ShortFlag
ParamTuple = tuple[ptype: ParameterType, pid, help: string]
SyntaxError = object of CatchableError
Values = ptr OrderedTable[string, Parameter]

Procs

proc addCommand(cli: Kapsis; id, cmdId, desc: string; args: seq[ParamTuple];
                callbackIdent: string; isSubCommand: bool; callback: Callback) {.
    ...raises: [KapsisDefect, ValueError, KeyError], tags: [].}
proc addDescription(cli: Kapsis; desc: string) {....raises: [], tags: [].}
proc addSeparator(cli: Kapsis; id: string; key: int) {....raises: [], tags: [].}
Add a new command separator, with or without a label 
proc addVersion(cli: Kapsis; vers: string) {....raises: [], tags: [].}
Use .nimble file to retrieve the app version and show in Usage when -v or --version 
proc printUsage(cli: Kapsis): string {....raises: [IOError, KeyError, ValueError],
                                       tags: [ReadIOEffect, WriteIOEffect].}
Parse and print usage based on given command line parameters

Macros

macro about(info)
Macro for adding info and other comments above usage commands. Informations provided via about macro will be shown only when user press app -h or app --help 
macro App(body)
macro commands(lines: untyped)
macro settings(database: static DBType; mainCmd: static string = "")
Change your CLI settings
